page.title: 08RHYL PROMENADE
page.content: Rhyl Promenade is long and flat and always has many attractive flowers in gardens and hanging baskets. Along the Promenade is the Floral Hall which is going to have aquaria and live butterflies in it. There is an open- air swimming pool which is closed for re-development. The Promenade Bowling Green is used for Crown Green National Tournaments and this year's tournament will be sponsored by the Midland Bank. Further along are putting greens and crazy golf. There is a Cyclorama track mainly for B.M.X. bicycles. There are paddling and boating pools and a roller skating rink for children of all ages. Facing the Promenade are amusement arcades and lots of bingo halls. There are hotels, guest houses and flatlets a few minutes walk from the beach. There are also many kiosks, cafes and snack bars.
